v-model:show.description: Whether to display the Actions panel

overlay.description: Whether or not to display the mask layer

overlay-class.description: Customize the class of the mask layer

overlay-style.description: Customize the style of the mask layer

lock-scroll.description: Whether to prohibit scroll penetration, when disabled, scrolling pop-up layer will not cause scrolling of the body
lock-scroll.description_zh: 是否禁止滚动穿透，禁止时滚动弹出层不会引发 body 的滚动

close-on-click-action.description: Whether or not to close the Actions panel when clicking an option
close-on-click-action.description_zh: 是否点击选项时关闭动作面板

close-on-click-overlay.description: Whether to click the mask layer to close the Actions panel
close-on-click-overlay.description_zh: 是否点击遮罩层关闭动作面板

safe-area.description: Whether to enable the bottom safe zone adaptation
safe-area.description_zh: 是否开启底部安全区适配

teleport.description: The location of the action panel

ActionSheet Options.name: lockScroll
ActionSheet Options.description: 是否禁止滚动穿透，禁止时滚动弹出层不会引发 body 的滚动

ActionSheet Options.name: closeOnClickOverlay
ActionSheet Options.description: 是否点击遮罩层关闭弹出层

ActionSheet Options.name: `safe-area`
ActionSheet Options.description: 是否开启底部安全区适配

ActionSheet Options.name: onOpened
ActionSheet Options.description: 动作面板开启动画结束回调

ActionSheet Options.name: onClosed
ActionSheet Options.description: 动作面板关闭动画结束回调

ActionSheet Action.name: icon
ActionSheet Action.description: icon 图标，支持网络图片地址

events.name: select
events.description: Select the option when you go

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered when the action panel is opened

events.name: opened
events.description: Triggers when the action panel is opened at the end of the animation
events.description_zh: 打开动作面板动画结束时触发

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the action panel is closed

events.name: closed
events.description: Triggers when the action panel is turned off when the animation ends
events.description_zh: 关闭动作面板动画结束时触发

events.name: click-overlay
events.description: Triggered when the mask layer is clicked
